text:
Udacity | Mountain View, San Francisco, Berlin, Sao Paulo, Shanghai | Full-Time, Onsite | https://www.udacity.com

Our mission is to bring accessible, affordable, engaging, and highly effective higher education to the world. We are building an online university, "by Silicon Valley", that teaches the skills that industry employers need today, delivers credentials endorsed by employers, and educates at a fraction of the cost of traditional schools.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/udacity

Our open positions can be found here - https://www.udacity.com/jobs#engineering?location=all

We have 31 Engineering positions open and we are currently looking for interns for Summer 2018!
